description: Details required for Condition 10 (Sustainability, Energy Conservation, CO2 Emissions) of planning permission 23/00697/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) for Application Reference Number: 22/02689/FUL (Partial Demolition, erection of side and roof extension and alteration to existing detached dwelling house. Erection of new dwelling house with off street car parking and landscaped garden.) dated 11/11/2022. Variation to consist of new single storey rear infill extension, internal alterations, changes to roof materials, alterations to rear fenestration, and additional rooflights to front and rear)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated through the submission of cogent evidence that the development has achieved at least a 19% improvement in CO2 emissions versus Part L of the Building Regulations and internal water usage rates of no greater than 105L per person per day, contrary to the requirements of Condition 10 and Policies CS1, DM3 and DM4 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012).

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP
